title: What is the greatest thing I can do with my new ukulele? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can trade it in for a real instrument… ;-) The best thing you can do is learn to read music and learn to play the instrument at a quality level. The ukulele is so much a “hobby” instrument. Due to it being fairly easy to learn, it is one of the “laziest” instruments to learn. Most students are kids who love the “little guitar”, although they often still don’t want to really work on playing the instrument well. It’s an instrument. Learn to play it at a high level. Show people that you can focus enough to become a major player. It’s been done, but not often.

What is the greatest thing I can do with my new ukulele? Learn to play it well enough to play with other musicians, either in a small group or at a jam. Nothing’s greater than making music with others (unless it’s sex, of course).
